body.name: Britax Skyline 2-Stage Belt-Positioning Booster Car Seat, Dusk - Highback and Backless Seat
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 6 hrs 13 mins
features: 2-in-1: The skyline belt positioning high back booster car seat easily coverts to a backless booster to keep your child safer, longer
Fit: 40 to 120 pounds and up to 63 inch height
Big kid comfort: Plush, foam padding and built in arm rests
Parent convenience: Removable cover and dishwasher-safe cup holders for easy cleaning between rides
Surrounded in safety: 2 layers of side impact protection include an energy absorbing shell & foam lined headrest
body.description: This 2-stage belt-positioning booster seat pairs superior safety with a stylish design. It easily converts from a high back booster to a backless booster, so your child rides safer, longer. 2 layers of side impact protection include an energy-absorbing shell and foam-lined headrest that surround your child's head, neck, and torso. Quickly and easily, position the vehicle seat belt using the color-coded belt guides. The 10-position, quick-adjust headrest grows with your child up to 63", and 2 dishwasher-safe cup holders keep drinks & snacks within reach. With plush, foam padding & built-in armrests, your big kid will enjoy the ride. In addition, this seat conveniently fits across in most vehicles, while still providing spacious comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to install :) but made in China :(
reviews.reviewText: The child is in the overlap stage of forward facing car seats and high backed boosters, so we were looking for something that was easier for air travel (use at destination) than our more lightweight carseat. We choose this one for a combination of reasonable price, super easy to use latch system, ability to convert to a backless booster when the time is right, thin profile for when we have 3 people across the back seat, and brand reputation. We were disappointed that this particular product was manufactured in China, but in the end we still chose to support a brand that does not do all of its manufacturing there.Installation was ridiculously easy, and the child loves her big girl booster. For now, we will continue to use it only for trips where we are flying to our destination and in the car at home that we use only for shorter drives, as our other car seat is still good for a few more inches and skinny minnie has even more room on the weight limit. When the time comes to replace the second carseat, we will likely look to purchase a second Britax booster seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to install. Seat has cup holders that come in handy. Comfortable for my granddaughter. She can still nap in the booster seat and not have her head rolling around. She likes that she can wear her coat while in the seat and it not be tight around her.

reviews.reviewText: Height adjustment for head and shoulder strap is easy to adjust for the safety of my child. The cup holder works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value and for older kids
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Britax Skyline 2-Stage car seat, and I must say, I am extremely satisfied with my purchase.Firstly, the safety features of this car seat are top-notch. It is equipped with a 5-point harness system that securely holds my child in place, providing maximum protection in the event of a collision. The seat also features side-impact protection, which gives me peace of mind knowing that my child is safe from all angles. The seat is also easy to install correctly, thanks to the clear and intuitive instructions provided.The comfort level of the Britax Skyline 2-Stage car seat is outstanding. The seat is well-padded and provides ample support for my child's head, neck, and back. The adjustable headrest and harness height ensure a perfect fit as my child grows, allowing for maximum comfort and safety. The seat also features built-in armrests, which my child loves and finds very comfortable during long car rides.Another great feature of this car seat is its versatility. It is a 2-stage car seat, meaning it can be used in both forward-facing and booster seat modes. This allows me to use the car seat for an extended period of time, saving me money in the long run. The transition between the two modes is seamless and easy, thanks to the simple adjustment mechanisms.Cleaning the Britax Skyline 2-Stage car seat is a breeze. The seat cover is removable and machine washable, which is a huge plus for parents dealing with spills and accidents. The fabric is also high-quality and durable, ensuring that it will withstand regular use and frequent washings.Overall, I highly recommend the Britax Skyline 2-Stage car seat. It offers excellent safety features, superior comfort, and versatility. The ease of installation and cleaning are additional advantages that make this car seat a standout choice. Whether you're a new parent or looking to upgrade your current car seat, the Britax Skyline 2-Stage car seat is a reliable and worthwhile investment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the quality of this seat and way worth it for the money i paid!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great booster seat- safe, stylish, but not spendy
reviews.reviewText: We love this booster. It’s not super wide like some of the others out there, has awesome easy-to-use anchor clips that make taking the seat in and out of the car a breeze, and it didn’t break the bank. Our son loves the bright blue color, too!
Comodo asiento y facil de instalacion. Se ve durable por el momento
